remarks: Non-zero series product with index set a subset of the upper integers.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Dec-2017.)
statement:
zprodn0.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
zprodn0.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
zprodn0.3 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= 0 ) $.
zprodn0.4 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( x. , F ) ~~> X ) $.
zprodn0.5 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ Z ) $.
zprodn0.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = if ( k e. A , B , 1 ) ) $.
zprodn0.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
zprodn0 $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B = X ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d k ph $.
